summary: The document is an official cover sheet associated with the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, detailing procedures for the release and handling of records. It includes instructions for changing limitation categories, the use of specific forms for administrative changes, and outlines the distribution process for copies to various departments.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It details administrative procedures for handling and distributing official cover documents.
Specific forms (FORM 642, FORM 1322, FORM 1323) are mentioned for changing limitation categories, submitting changes affecting the cover, and transferring the cover respectively.
The distribution list includes multiple copies designated for different departments or components.
